payload.description: Create PhotoCaptionEditor.jsx - full-screen caption editor using MobileModal. Image preview at top (60% height), caption textarea below with auto-focus. Props: imageUrl, caption, onSave, onCancel. Save/Cancel buttons with 44px touch targets at bottom with safe-area padding.
payload.context: Uses MobileModal component from ui/mobile with fullScreenOnMobile=true, enableSwipeClose=true, safeAreaPadding=true. Textarea should expand as user types. Max-height to prevent keyboard overlap. Brand gradient header (optio-purple to optio-pink).
